name: BUTT DAEMON - Demo
description:
Warning this game contains sexual content and should not be played by anyone under the age of 18 years.

This is a very short and silly game I made using some characters that recur in my comics. I hope you find it as amusing as me.

Looks best in full screen!!!

Controls:

Movement: Left & Right Arrows

Jump: Z

Interact: Up Arrow

Disclaimer: 

All graphic assets are made by me.

Music and sound effects are from the GB Studio library.
